title: Pope Francis criticizes people who choose to have pets instead of children
content:
1. Pope Francis criticizes people who choose to have pets instead of children  CBS News
  2. Opting for pets over children is selfish and 'takes away our humanity,' says Pope Francis  CNN
  3. Pope Scolds Couples Who Choose Pets Over Kids  The New York Times
  4. CNN tries to dunk on Pope Francis — worst 'gotcha' of 2022 so far  Washington Examiner
  5. I’d rather have cats than kids – what’s selfish about that?  The Independent
